org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.layers

Interface ExtendedPropertiesSupport

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DocumentManager, FLayer, FLyrRaster, GraphicLayer, LayoutManager, Project, Project, RasterLayer, SingleLayer, VectorLayer, ViewDocument
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDocumentManager, BaseViewDocument, DefaultFLyrRaster, DefaultGraphicLayer, DefaultLayoutManager, DefaultProject, DefaultRasterLayer, DefaultViewDocument, ExtendedPropertiesHelper, FLayers, FLayers, FLyrBingMaps, FLyrDefault, FLyrGoogleMaps, FLyrOSM, FLyrVect, FLyrVect, FLyrWCS, FLyrWMS, FLyrWMTS, PortableViewDocumentManager, TableManager, ViewManager
    Deprecated. 
    use org.gvsig.tools.util.PropertiesSupport

    public interface ExtendedPropertiesSupport

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map getExtendedProperties()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a hash map with all new properties associated to this layer.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        java.lang.Object getProperty(java.lang.Object key)
        Deprecated. 

        Returns a reference to an object (property) associated to this layer.

        For example, you can attach a network definition to key "network" and check if a layer has a network loaded using getAssociatedObject("network") and that it's not null.

        Parameters:
        key - the key associated to the property
        Returns:
        null if key is not found
        See Also:
        getExtendedProperties(), setProperty(Object, Object)

      • setProperty

        void setProperty(java.lang.Object key,
                 java.lang.Object obj)
        Deprecated. 
        Inserts an object as a property to this layer.
        Parameters:
        key - the key associated to the property
        obj - the property
        See Also:
        getProperty(Object), getExtendedProperties()

      • getExtendedProperties

        java.util.Map getExtendedProperties()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a hash map with all new properties associated to this layer.
        Returns:
        hash table with the added properties
        See Also:
        getProperty(Object), setProperty(Object, Object)
